thread.title: A.R. Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles
thread.title_full: A.R. Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: A.R. Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles
text:
Oscar-winning composer A.R. Rahman has been named the Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles. The music maestro has sent out his love and regard to the people and government of the foreign nation.

A.R. Rahman 
The composer, who has taken Indian music on a world tour with his sounds, shared the news with his fans and followers on Twitter.
A two-time Oscar winning composer, Rahman shared an image of the certificate, on the micro-blogging site.
“With love and regards to the people and government of Seychelles," he captioned the picture.
The certificate reads: “The Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture proudly names A.R. Rahman Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles in appreciation for the invaluable services contributed to enhance Seychelles's Art and Cultural development.”
